snippet.title: World of Jade Dynasty - Alpha Test Official Trailer
snippet.description:
World of Jade Dynasty《诛仙世界》enters a limited technical testing phase scheduled from August 19 to August 23, available worldwide. Players who will receive the test confirmation will be able to participate in the current stage of the game. The developers hope to collect feedback from the players through this test. During the test, only 5 classes, 5 locations, and 1 instance will be available. 

World of Jade Dynasty is a direct sequel to the popular MMORPG in 2007, Jade Dynasty (Zhu Xian). If you didn't know, World of Jade Dynasty was originally developed on one of Perfect World's proprietary engines in 2013. It was shortly discontinued to be redeveloped on Unreal Engine 4 in 2016. Since then, the project has been on full-fledged development along with Perfect New World which also started around the same time. Last month, AMD announced Perfect World Remake and Swordsman Remake (unannounced title) are two of the first few titles to be supported by FSR 2.0. 

Note that the test is not limited to Chinese. Head to the game's official website to register at zxsj.wanmei.com

Stay tuned!
